name: Weight 002
description:
1/1,Digital, 5772 x 3508px, JPEG

This NFT was minted in commemoration with "The Weight of Water", my solo exhibition in Singapore and Paris in November 2021, presented by Chan + Hori Contemporary, Singapore and the Spaceless Gallery, Paris.

"Weight 002" is a new work that was created especially to be made into an NFT. No other physical versions such as a print, a drawing, or a painting of this work exist.
